name: upshiftai
description: Dependency lineage analysis: ancient/deprecated/vulnerable packages (npm, pip, go). Run report and summarize.

tools.name: analyze_dependencies
tools.description: Run UpshiftAI dependency analysis on a project and return a short summary or one-pager. Surfaces ancient/deprecated packages, security vulns (npm audit / pip-audit), and suggested fixes.

projectPath.description: Path to project root (directory containing package-lock.json, requirements.txt, or go.mod). Default: current workspace or .

summaryOnly.description: If true, return only the one-pager (risk, TL;DR, do this first). If false, return summary plus top problematic packages.

includeFullReport.description: If true, also return full JSON report (entries, audit). Use when user wants details.

tools.name: dependency_health
tools.description: Quick health check: one-line status (OK/WARN/FAIL) and counts for ancient, deprecated, and high/critical vulns. Good for CI or quick answer.

projectPath.description: Path to project root. Default: current workspace or .
